## packet volume detach

Detaches a volume from a device

### Synopsis

Example:

packet volume detach --id [attachment_UUID]



```
packet volume detach [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for detach
  -i, --id string   UUID of the attached volume
```
